scripts.start-kafka: cd docker-compose/confluent-kafka && docker-compose up -d --build && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.start-elastic-mongo: cd docker-compose/elastic-compose && docker-compose up -d --build && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.docker-ps: cd docker-compose/elastic-compose && docker-compose ps && cd .. && cd confluent-kafka && docker-compose ps && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.docker-stop: cd docker-compose/elastic-compose && docker-compose stop && cd .. && cd confluent-kafka && docker-compose stop && cd .. && cd ..
